data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Fluminense at Serra Dourada.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 12, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
Fluminense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Goianiense GO.
In the minute 14, Goianiense GO push forward at Serra Dourada and Luis Eduardo Marques Dos Santos gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fluminense defence.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 21, Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Goiania.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Fluminense's half.
In the minute 23, Play has been interrupted briefly in Goiania to check on Luccas Claro, who is grimacing with pain.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 25, Luccas Claro returns to the field for Fluminense after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luccas Claro is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Matheus Ferraz (Fluminense) has replaced the possibly injured Luccas Claro.
In the minute 33, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Goianiense GO's Wellington Rato breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Goianiense GO surge into the attack at Serra Dourada but Gustavo Ferrareisâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 39, Luis Eduardo Marques Dos Santos (Goianiense GO) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In Goiania Goianiense GO drive forward through Chico. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 40, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 43, Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Goal! Wellington Rato gives Goianiense GO a 1-0 lead in Goiania.
Marlon Freitas with an assist there.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Fluminense at Serra Dourada.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Fluminense.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, At Serra Dourada the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Serra Dourada.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a second substitution, with Fernando Pacheco replacing Michel Araujo.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
In the minute 48, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 51, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Yuri Lima for Fluminense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 52, Fluminenseâ€™s Yuri Lima is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
Free kick Fluminense.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Marcos Paulo of Fluminense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 59, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO's Natanael Batista Pimenta misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In the minute 61, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 63, Wellington Rato gets his shot on target but fails to score for Goianiense GO.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
In the minute 67, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Goianiense GO make their second substitution with Danilo Gomes replacing Gustavo Ferrareis.
In the minute 69, Jose Roberto Assuncao de Araujo Filho is booked for the home team.
Marcelo Cabo is making the team's first substitution at Serra Dourada with Roberson replacing Jose Roberto Assuncao de Araujo Filho.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 70, Hudson (Fluminense) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Fluminense's half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
The away team have replaced Yuri Lima with Lucca. This is the third substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 76, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lucca (Fluminense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 79, Goianiense GO's Chico gets in a shot on goal at Serra Dourada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 81, Janderson Santos de Souza is replacing Wellington Rato for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 84, The home team replace Chico with Lucas da Cruz Oliveira.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 85, Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a fourth substitution, with Ganso replacing Nene.
Felippe Cardoso is replacing Marcos Paulo for the away team.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a penalty in Goiania...
In the minute 87, Goianiense GO are going well in Goiania. They now lead 2-0 thanks to a Jean penalty.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Natanael Batista Pimenta (Goianiense GO) has received a yellow card from Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Ganso (Fluminense) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Fernando Pacheco (Fluminense) gets a yellow card.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a header from Felippe Cardoso.
